评论详情: Daughterinlaw loves it
Heavy, warm, gorgeous! I got the green in large and came back for the light blue.  Love it.
I love how soft and warm this hoodie is. It fit perfectly. The material is good quality and it is worth the price 🥰
Love it! Cozy sweatshirt. Ordered one each for my daughter and daughter-in-law for the chilly night sports events.
I like the color & mostly the way it fits like a glove, very comfortable & warm.

评论概述: Love this Zip up Hoodie - acid wash oversized sweatshirts
评论详情: Wine color/extra Large (XL):  first, the color is a lot lighter than it appears online but I still like it. I normally wear XXL size (I weight about 200 lbs 5' 3". But decided to order smaller size since it is oversized. It is still a little big but really nice and warm/heavy/comfortable. The arms have a nice tight elastic cuff that stays around your wrist.  I have short arms and have trouble finding shirts etc. that don't slide down below my hand. I just might order another color :)

The hoodie is very warm and exactly what I needed. It did shrink a little in length which disappointed me. I think I will try and not dry it in the dryer to keep as much length as possible. I was able to purchase it on sale so I will not return it, but I will not purchase another at the higher price because of the shrinkage. I love the color.
Love this jacket!!  Better than I expected!
I 100% underestimated the quality of this hoodie. It is well worth the money. it’s THICK, warm, and just the right amount of oversized!! LOVE IT!!
Perfect for an ADHD girlie wanting a little weight and comfort. Great value. My little sister tries to steal mine all the time. Fits me perfectly.
Excellent quality, warm and cozy

Soft, slightly “antiqued” looking, and warm! Got it so cheap and it’s one of the nicest little hoodies I’ve ever had. It’s not thin cheap material. It’s actual pretty warm, and I love zippers on my hoodies. The lining is soft and fuzzy.  Fit perfect. I like the bit of extra room and POCKETS.

评论概述: Color and style not as pictured.
评论详情: This picture looks like something a teen girl would like but this looks like an ugly boy sweatshirt for backyard football.  Not cute at all.  Going to return.
Such a cozy hoodie and fits very well with a relaxed fit. Love the color, it’s very well made and great  quality.

Love this sweatshirt! It is my go for sure! Very warm, soft and comfortable. Nice thickness makes it even more comfortable. It definitely keeps you warm. It is not a light sweatshirt at all. For keeping warm!
Material is perfect for chilly weather. It fits well and I love the color. It is washable and material is warm but not too thick.

This is the third hoodie ( first of this style ) from this brand I've bought, and I really love them! They are a nice, thick, soft material, which is great for colder weather. Being an oversized style, you can get the normal size in hoodies that you wear, and this will fit great.
It's a warm weighted hoodie. It's perfect for chilly windy cool weather. Washes nicely. Love it!
i love it
Love the size and fit but definitely not black still love it tho but black would of been better .

评论概述: Warm and thick but fits little weird.
评论详情: I like that this is a thick, warm sweatshirt. What I dontmlike is that they elastic around the waist is loose. It just hangs instead of hugging tight to the body. The fit is okay. It's just isn't as comfortable to wear as most of my other sweatshirts. It's a bit still. I do really like the color and it's perfect for fall. It's an ok sweatshirt but I wouldn't order another.

I'm a redhead so I wasn't sure how this would look but the color is flattering and the hoodie is very comfortable. The size is oversized and I love having this to throw on when it gets chilly. I definitely recommend this and I also recommend stepping out of your comfort zone when it comes to colors - you'll be surprised!
I love this hoodie. It's nice and thick and it's warm and I just ordered another one in a different color
I will definitely be living in this jacket for the winter. Nice and heavy-duty yet nice and soft to the touch. I'd recommend any woman to buy yourself one. It's well worth the money.
This is a really nicely made, heavy duty zip up hoodie. It has a really nice washed vintage look to it. It’s very durable and fits great.
This hoodie is heavier than expected and feels like really nice quality.  Cute hoodie for the fall weather.
Same as pictured and true to size! Lovely jacket for this fall season
The zipper was broken before I took it out of the packaging!! Used? I'm very unhappy.

I absolutely adore the Trendy Queen Zip Up Hoodies! The acid wash design gives it a unique and stylish edge, making it a standout piece in my wardrobe. The oversized fit is incredibly comfortable, perfect for lounging at home or running errands in style. The zip-up feature adds versatility, allowing me to layer it easily over any outfit. The fabric is soft and cozy, keeping me warm without feeling bulky. I've received so many compliments on it, and it’s quickly become my go-to hoodie for any occasion. Highly recommend for anyone looking to blend comfort with trendy fashion!
It’s made a very good and thick material It’s warm and soft It got on so in my shrink if you wash it and dry it with temperature high It’s true size

评论概述: Thick and warm, pretty blue color
评论详情: This Trendy Queen Zip Up Hoodie is cute.  The material is thick and tightly woven, so it's warm and moderately windproof.  The zipper is metal and zips easily, and the hood has drawstring.  The inside of it feels soft, but the outside feels a little stiff.  I ordered it in skyblue and the color looks like a beachy, light turquoise that's really pretty.  I have a 44" chest and ordered a size L.  It's a nice roomy fit.
Looks good on. Made well. Nice and warm!
More of an orangey rust color. Washed & dried well. Thick and warm. Sized up for a baggy, oversized fit.

The sweatshirt is very roomy. I wanted it to fit loosely and got a size up so it is very roomy. The material is nice and soft, thick and very warm. The color is pretty. It looks well made. This will be very cozy in the cold weather and will go well with any outfit.

This is a thick well made hoodie that zips up. It is fleecy inside as you would expect from a hoodie- but you never know these days. It fits well. This is exactly what you want and expect from a hoodie. I’m happy with it and would recommend it.

评论概述: Hard to find zip up hoodies
评论详情: After a lot of searching, I finally found a zip up hoodie for my mom. She can't stand things around her neck, so pullovers are a no-no. This hoodie is extremely soft and comfy and the zipper seems sturdy and the whole thing is well made.

From the wife:  This is a great quality sweatshirt - material feels soft and also thick. It’s warm - the inside is very soft and it feels good on your skin (not scratchy at all!) The front ziper works great and nicely. I’m 5’10/141lb and ordered a large one - it’s true to size and I wanted it to be a bit oversized. Washing machine and dryer safe - just by touching it you can tell it’s made of a good and durable fabric. Love it!

Overall it’s a nice quality but it isn’t what is in the picture. I ordered black and assumed it was going to look like what is pictured but it isn’t. It’s got grey in it. It looks kind of faded. I needed plain black and the regular hoodie comes in plain black. They definitely need to update their pictures so it isn’t false advertising.

I got this for my daughter in a size large. She could wear a medium but she wanted it to fit a little big and it fits just how she wants. It's a lot thicker and heavier than other zip up hoodies we have which was a nice surprise. It'll keep her warm for fall. She likes the washed black/gray color and it's pretty soft inside. I'd definitely order it again!

The 50/50 blend used for this jacket offers the durability of cotton paired with the softness of polyester. The outside feels rugged and durable, while the soft fleece inside keeps me warm and cozy. I am 5'8" 145 lbs, and the medium offers a nice roomy fit. The length is perfect, with the hem at my hips and cuffs just a couple inches past my wrists. The generous cut allows plenty of room to layer up with a bulky sweatshirt underneath. The dusty pink with acid wash design looks great, and the high quality is impressive for the price point.

评论概述: Nice color, heavier than average hoodie, roomy, comfy
评论详情: I usually wear medium and this was a little oversized, big enough to wear a pullover sweater underneath. I love the pink color, it's a dusty rose. Very comfortable and heavier than average. I love it! Cotton and polyester, half and half. I washed it in the machine in cold water with a quick low temp tumble dry then line dry to finish.

评论概述: Fits nice, feels nice and should get quite the work out in a couple of months
评论详情: Needed to replace my previous one which was worn out, Nicely made, feels and fits well and will get quite a work out very soon.

评论概述: Regular thickness hoodie, not super thick, but not thin
评论详情: I thought this was going to be double thick for fall and winter as it claims to keep you warm in fall and winter weather. This is misleading. The picture does not show it very well, the edging looks double thick but it is just because of the zipper area needs extra fabric and extends to about 2". Aside from that this is a typical hoodie thickness, it is not thin which would be more for spring and summer. It could keep you warm but it depends on how warm you need it, and if you layer up with a puffer vest or not. The black acid wash looks like it's a worn and used look like you've owned it for a while. I like that style very much and knew that this would have that look before I ordered it. The zipper runs smooth, the size is perfect, order your usual size, or use the size chart. If you like roomier jackets, order one size up.

Wow ! This hoodie is fantastic! The inside is upper soft and comfortable to wear. The size fits well. It’s not too short and boxy or too long . My favorite thing about this hoodie though is how thick and heavy it is. It’s more of a winter hoodie that you can wear in place of a jacket. The hood is double layered and super warm as well. I love the stone wash design too.

This hoodie is thick and very soft! It’s perfect for the colder winter months. I love the bleached look, though it also had a bleach smell when I pulled it out of the bag. Overall I love it! I ordered a small which fit perfectly. (I’m 5’5” 128lbs for reference)

评论概述: Comfortable oversized hoodie, great for cooler weather
评论详情: I ordered this hoodie in size medium, my normal size.  This hoodie is generously oversized and extremely comfortable and warm.  I chose the gray color, which has a nice weathered look, and should hold up nicely to repeated washings.  Would recommend!

For reference in 5ft4, 32 bust, 26 waist, 35.5in hips and I Ordered Small  This is a Great Sweatshirt Hoodie! Nice weight to it and it’s oversized but not overly to the point where it feels like 2 people could fit.  Im glad I got Black (I think it’s lighter in person)! I’ve a theory that anything other than a quaint, essential Little Black Dress I “can’t” really wear well because it’s just too solid and stark. So i’m testing out heathered, washed and “muddled” blacks and I now think im ok with these.

it says oversized but the medium was still on the small side for oversized, and the fabric is kind of stiff and not very soft.  So it didn't fit. and you can't tell in the photos and if you miss the "title" it isn't black- but a mottled "acid" wash heatheredish black... so grey blotches mixed with black... looks a bit like you washed it wrong.

I'm not a model, so I don't know how useful those pictures will be to you, but this thing fits great. It's soft. It's crazy warm. And it's well made! I might have to go back for more colors. I can finally retire the ratty hoodie I've been wearing for the last twenty years. I feel good about throwing this thing on when I'm just after warmth rather than a fashion statement, because now I'm doing both. I will actually look like I do something besides roll out of bed and grab whatever is handy. And as the autumn comes blowing in outside, I know I'm about to get a lot of use out this hoodie. Highly recommend.
